ValidationRule.description: Prevents EDRD users from creating an inactive Provider-Allied Staff relationship when the Account and Contact record types are specific and roles as Allied Staff.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISNEW(), CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, "EDRD"), Account.RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Provider', Contact.Account.RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Provider', INCLUDES(Roles, 'Allied Staff'), NOT(IsActive) )
